data.title: 15523 W FM8, Stephenville, TX 76401
data.meta_description: For Sale: 15523 W FM8, Stephenville, TX 76401 ∙ $1,950,000 ∙ 47.84 Acres Lot ∙ 4,232 Sqft, 5 beds, 2 full and 1 half baths, County Homes/Acreage ∙ View more.
data.text:

4,232 Sqft. ($461/Sqft.) 393 (m²)

47.84 Lot Acres

Country Homes/Acreage

Audio narrative

15523 W FM8 is listed for sale at $ 1,950,000. The Country Homes/Acreage property has 5 bedrooms, 2 Full Bathrooms, 1 Half Bathroom, 4232 square feet and was built in 1973. The lot size is 47.84 Acres. ##BR##Welcome to your opportunity to own a piece of countryside paradise! This 1973 ranch house nestled on 47 sprawling acres boasts scenic views and endless possibilities. Featuring 5 bedrooms and 2.5 baths, this charming home offers ample space for family living or hosting guests. The property’s unique features include dairy barn amenities, with 3 TCEQ registered lagoons, offering potential for various business ventures. Whether you dream of operating a dairy farm, a winery, cultivating a hobby farm, or transforming the land into a cattle or horse property, the choice is yours. In addition to the main residence, multiple outhouses and buildings will convey with the property if purchased before May 30th, providing a turnkey opportunity to kickstart your entrepreneurial endeavors. Don’t miss out on this rare chance to create the rural lifestyle you’ve always imagined. Embrace the tranquility of country living while exploring the potential for business ventures on this fantastic property.
